content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":153901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、今回のことで敵も威力は充分に知った。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, through this incident, the enemy now fully understands our power."},{"lineNumber":153902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日の朝には死にもの狂いで攻めてくるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"They will attack desperately by tomorrow morning."},{"lineNumber":153903,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、今夜中かも知れぬ」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it might even be tonight.\""},{"lineNumber":153904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「砲台は強力な分簡単には動かせん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The artillery is powerful, but it cannot be moved easily."},{"lineNumber":153905,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ましてや接近戦ともなれば守り切るなど到底……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially if it comes to close combat, there's no way to fully defend them...\""},{"lineNumber":153906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、急げよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, hurry up.\""},{"lineNumber":153907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":153908,"originalJapaneseLine":"去り際、丘の上でバレスは","translatedEnglishLine":"As he left, Bares on the hill"},{"lineNumber":153909,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍を激しく睨みつけた。","translatedEnglishLine":"glared fiercely at the demon army."},{"lineNumber":153910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回のことは痛み分け……と、言いたいが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to say this was a stalemate... but..."},{"lineNumber":153911,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらの方が未だ分が悪い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"we are still at a disadvantage...\""},{"lineNumber":153912,"originalJapaneseLine":"視線はツイと魔人のいる方角へ。","translatedEnglishLine":"His gaze slowly turned towards the direction of the demon lord."},{"lineNumber":153913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せめて流れが変えられれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If only we could change the tide...\""},{"lineNumber":153914,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍へ与えた被害は甚大なれど、","translatedEnglishLine":"Although the damage inflicted on the demon army was severe,"},{"lineNumber":153915,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵の兵力が無尽蔵とよく知るバレスの声は、","translatedEnglishLine":"knowing well that the enemy's forces are inexhaustible, Bares' voice"},{"lineNumber":153916,"originalJapaneseLine":"自然と苦渋に満ちたものとなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"naturally filled with bitterness."},{"lineNumber":153917,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿に任せるしか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We have no choice but to leave it to Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":153918,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あるまいか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"isn't that so...?\""},{"lineNumber":153919,"originalJapaneseLine":"寂しげなバレスに気づき、","translatedEnglishLine":"Noticing Bares' lonely expression,"},{"lineNumber":153920,"originalJapaneseLine":"スーが秘書ではなく娘として寄り添う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sue leaned close to him, not as a secretary but as a daughter."},{"lineNumber":153921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お父様は将軍として","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Father always chose the optimal solution as a general."},{"lineNumber":153922,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最適解を常に選択されました」","translatedEnglishLine":"He always chose the best course of action.\""},{"lineNumber":153923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かっておる、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I know,"},{"lineNumber":153924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分かっておる、が……","translatedEnglishLine":"I know, but..."},{"lineNumber":153925,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悔しいのう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it’s frustrating...\""},{"lineNumber":153926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……黒の軍将軍の名が泣いておるわい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...The name of the Black Army General is crying."},{"lineNumber":153927,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスと魔軍の戦場。","translatedEnglishLine":"The battlefield of Riesz and the demon army."},{"lineNumber":153928,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの展開した撤退行動により","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to the retreat maneuvers deployed by Bares,"},{"lineNumber":153929,"originalJapaneseLine":"たった一日でお互いの領土は大きく移り変わっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the territories of both sides had significantly shifted in just one day."},{"lineNumber":153930,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がリーザス軍野営地に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group arrived at the Riesz army's camp."},{"lineNumber":153931,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜――","translatedEnglishLine":"Night—"},{"lineNumber":153932,"originalJapaneseLine":"本日の戦いが終わり、両軍が陣地へと引き上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"After today's battle ended, both armies withdrew to their positions."},{"lineNumber":153933,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨日までと違う陣地に腰を落ち着け、","translatedEnglishLine":"Settling into different positions than before,"},{"lineNumber":153934,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス兵達が本日の疲れを少しでも癒やすべく","translatedEnglishLine":"the Riesz soldiers tried to ease their fatigue from the day,"},{"lineNumber":153935,"originalJapaneseLine":"大いに食べ、大いに休む。","translatedEnglishLine":"eating plenty and resting well."},{"lineNumber":153936,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰もが精魂尽き果てた顔で俯いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone lowered their heads with exhausted faces."},{"lineNumber":153937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「暗っ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So gloomy."},{"lineNumber":153938,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界の終わりみたいな顔しおって。","translatedEnglishLine":"They all look like it’s the end of the world."},{"lineNumber":153939,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちまで気が滅入るぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s depressing even for me.\""},{"lineNumber":153940,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":153941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「申し訳ありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m sorry."},{"lineNumber":153942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統閣下に何度も手間をかけさせまして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have troubled the Supreme Commander many times...\""},{"lineNumber":153943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったくだ、戦線が下がるから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly, since the front line is retreating,"},{"lineNumber":153944,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様達まで下がることになっちまった」","translatedEnglishLine":"even we had to fall back.\""},{"lineNumber":153945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦況を聞く為にここまで来たってのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I came all the way here to hear about the battle situation,"},{"lineNumber":153946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうこんな夜更けだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and it's already this late at night.\""},{"lineNumber":153947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「重ね重ね申し訳ありません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I apologize repeatedly..."},{"lineNumber":153948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに将軍のもとに案内させて頂きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will immediately guide you to the general.\""},{"lineNumber":153949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんかムカつくから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I’m kind of annoyed, so"},{"lineNumber":153950,"originalJapaneseLine":"　将軍に会ったら蹴っ飛ばすか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I might just kick the general when I meet him.\""},{"lineNumber":153951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Haha..."},{"lineNumber":153952,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすが総統殿は……すごい気合いで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected of the Supreme Commander... such incredible spirit...\""},{"lineNumber":153953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様、やめましょうよぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lord Rance, please stop...\""},{"lineNumber":153954,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ま、まさか本気で……？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(C-Could he really be serious...?)"},{"lineNumber":153955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、これはランス殿！　よくぞご無事で！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Lord Rance! I'm glad you are safe!\""},{"lineNumber":153956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死ね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Die!\""},{"lineNumber":153957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐおーっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwah!?"},{"lineNumber":153958,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは久しぶりに再会したバレスに","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, upon meeting Bares again after a long time,"},{"lineNumber":153959,"originalJapaneseLine":"早速蹴りを食らわせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"immediately gave him a kick."},{"lineNumber":153960,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あいたた……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ow, ow...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、今回のことで敵も威力は充分に知った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, through this incident, the enemy now fully understands our power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日の朝には死にもの狂いで攻めてくるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They will attack desperately by tomorrow morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、今夜中かも知れぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it might even be tonight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砲台は強力な分簡単には動かせん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The artillery is powerful, but it cannot be moved easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ましてや接近戦ともなれば守り切るなど到底……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially if it comes to close combat, there's no way to fully defend them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、急げよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, hurry up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 去り際、丘の上でバレスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he left, Bares on the hill

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を激しく睨みつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: glared fiercely at the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回のことは痛み分け……と、言いたいが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to say this was a stalemate... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの方が未だ分が悪い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are still at a disadvantage..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視線はツイと魔人のいる方角へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His gaze slowly turned towards the direction of the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せめて流れが変えられれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If only we could change the tide..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍へ与えた被害は甚大なれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although the damage inflicted on the demon army was severe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の兵力が無尽蔵とよく知るバレスの声は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knowing well that the enemy's forces are inexhaustible, Bares' voice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然と苦渋に満ちたものとなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: naturally filled with bitterness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿に任せるしか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have no choice but to leave it to Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるまいか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't that so...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しげなバレスに気づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Noticing Bares' lonely expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーが秘書ではなく娘として寄り添う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sue leaned close to him, not as a secretary but as a daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お父様は将軍として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Father always chose the optimal solution as a general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最適解を常に選択されました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He always chose the best course of action."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かっておる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かっておる、が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悔しいのう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s frustrating..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……黒の軍将軍の名が泣いておるわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The name of the Black Army General is crying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスと魔軍の戦場。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battlefield of Riesz and the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの展開した撤退行動により
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the retreat maneuvers deployed by Bares,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一日でお互いの領土は大きく移り変わっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the territories of both sides had significantly shifted in just one day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がリーザス軍野営地に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group arrived at the Riesz army's camp.
Night—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本日の戦いが終わり、両軍が陣地へと引き上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After today's battle ended, both armies withdrew to their positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日までと違う陣地に腰を落ち着け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Settling into different positions than before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵達が本日の疲れを少しでも癒やすべく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Riesz soldiers tried to ease their fatigue from the day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大いに食べ、大いに休む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: eating plenty and resting well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もが精魂尽き果てた顔で俯いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone lowered their heads with exhausted faces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「暗っ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So gloomy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の終わりみたいな顔しおって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They all look like it’s the end of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちまで気が滅入るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s depressing even for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「申し訳ありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’m sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下に何度も手間をかけさせまして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have troubled the Supreme Commander many times..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったくだ、戦線が下がるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly, since the front line is retreating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様達まで下がることになっちまった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even we had to fall back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦況を聞く為にここまで来たってのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came all the way here to hear about the battle situation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうこんな夜更けだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it's already this late at night."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「重ね重ね申し訳ありません……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I apologize repeatedly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに将軍のもとに案内させて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will immediately guide you to the general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんかムカつくから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I’m kind of annoyed, so

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍に会ったら蹴っ飛ばすか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I might just kick the general when I meet him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Haha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが総統殿は……すごい気合いで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of the Supreme Commander... such incredible spirit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様、やめましょうよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lord Rance, please stop..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ま、まさか本気で……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (C-Could he really be serious...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、これはランス殿！　よくぞご無事で！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Lord Rance! I'm glad you are safe!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐおーっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwah!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは久しぶりに再会したバレスに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, upon meeting Bares again after a long time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早速蹴りを食らわせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately gave him a kick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あいたた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ow, ow..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I'm glad you are safe!\""},{"lineNumber":153956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死ね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Die!\""},{"lineNumber":153957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐおーっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwah!?"},{"lineNumber":153958,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは久しぶりに再会したバレスに","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, upon meeting Bares again after a long time,"},{"lineNumber":153959,"originalJapaneseLine":"早速蹴りを食らわせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"immediately gave him a kick."},{"lineNumber":153960,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あいたた……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ow, ow...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、今回のことで敵も威力は充分に知った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, through this incident, the enemy now fully understands our power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日の朝には死にもの狂いで攻めてくるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They will attack desperately by tomorrow morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、今夜中かも知れぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it might even be tonight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砲台は強力な分簡単には動かせん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The artillery is powerful, but it cannot be moved easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ましてや接近戦ともなれば守り切るなど到底……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially if it comes to close combat, there's no way to fully defend them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、急げよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, hurry up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 去り際、丘の上でバレスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he left, Bares on the hill

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を激しく睨みつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: glared fiercely at the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回のことは痛み分け……と、言いたいが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to say this was a stalemate... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの方が未だ分が悪い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are still at a disadvantage..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視線はツイと魔人のいる方角へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His gaze slowly turned towards the direction of the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せめて流れが変えられれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If only we could change the tide..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍へ与えた被害は甚大なれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although the damage inflicted on the demon army was severe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の兵力が無尽蔵とよく知るバレスの声は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knowing well that the enemy's forces are inexhaustible, Bares' voice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然と苦渋に満ちたものとなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: naturally filled with bitterness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿に任せるしか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have no choice but to leave it to Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるまいか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't that so...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しげなバレスに気づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Noticing Bares' lonely expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーが秘書ではなく娘として寄り添う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sue leaned close to him, not as a secretary but as a daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お父様は将軍として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Father always chose the optimal solution as a general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最適解を常に選択されました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He always chose the best course of action."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かっておる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かっておる、が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悔しいのう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s frustrating..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……黒の軍将軍の名が泣いておるわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The name of the Black Army General is crying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスと魔軍の戦場。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battlefield of Riesz and the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの展開した撤退行動により
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the retreat maneuvers deployed by Bares,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一日でお互いの領土は大きく移り変わっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the territories of both sides had significantly shifted in just one day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がリーザス軍野営地に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group arrived at the Riesz army's camp.
Night—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本日の戦いが終わり、両軍が陣地へと引き上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After today's battle ended, both armies withdrew to their positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日までと違う陣地に腰を落ち着け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Settling into different positions than before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵達が本日の疲れを少しでも癒やすべく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Riesz soldiers tried to ease their fatigue from the day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大いに食べ、大いに休む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: eating plenty and resting well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もが精魂尽き果てた顔で俯いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone lowered their heads with exhausted faces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「暗っ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So gloomy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の終わりみたいな顔しおって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They all look like it’s the end of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちまで気が滅入るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s depressing even for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「申し訳ありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’m sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下に何度も手間をかけさせまして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have troubled the Supreme Commander many times..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったくだ、戦線が下がるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly, since the front line is retreating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様達まで下がることになっちまった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even we had to fall back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦況を聞く為にここまで来たってのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came all the way here to hear about the battle situation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうこんな夜更けだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it's already this late at night."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「重ね重ね申し訳ありません……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I apologize repeatedly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに将軍のもとに案内させて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will immediately guide you to the general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんかムカつくから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I’m kind of annoyed, so

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍に会ったら蹴っ飛ばすか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I might just kick the general when I meet him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Haha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが総統殿は……すごい気合いで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of the Supreme Commander... such incredible spirit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様、やめましょうよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lord Rance, please stop..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ま、まさか本気で……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (C-Could he really be serious...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、これはランス殿！　よくぞご無事で！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Lord Rance! I'm glad you are safe!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐおーっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwah!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは久しぶりに再会したバレスに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, upon meeting Bares again after a long time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早速蹴りを食らわせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately gave him a kick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あいたた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ow, ow..."
